entry.title: Hernandez et al, flashfm fine mapping published in Nat Comms

link.title: Hernandez et al, flashfm fine mapping published in Nat Comms

entry.content:

entry.title: New preprint evaluation of biclustering in gene expression data

link.title: New preprint evaluation of biclustering in gene expression data

entry.content:
New preprint by Kath Nicholls carefully compares 4 sets of biclustering algorithms according to their ability to identify structure in gene expression data. Using real data to evaluate biclusters helps go beyond gene-only or sample-only evaluation. https://t.co/cRNNZqUSnl
